errors.error_description: Incorrect system package installation - trying to install Python package via apt-get
correction_candidates: git clone https://github.com/bitcart/bitcart.git && cd bitcart && pip install -e .

errors.error_description: Reference to non-existent configuration file path
correction_candidates: Edit the main configuration file located at `config.env` in the project root to customize your installation.
Edit the main configuration file located at `.env` in the project directory to customize your installation.
Edit the configuration file located at `bitcart/settings.py` to customize your installation.
Create and edit a configuration file named `config.yaml` in your project directory to customize your installation.
errors.golden_answer: Edit the main configuration file located at `.env` in the project directory to customize your installation.
